sources.title: I-Ski Love-Ski You-Ski (1936)
sources.description: Popeye takes Olive mountain climbing. Bluto sets various traps for them along the way. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/i-ski-love-ski-you-ski-1936/

metadata.Plot: Popeye takes Olive mountain climbing. Bluto sets various traps for them along the way, which Popeye manages to overcome. They get to the top, and Bluto pushes Popeye off a cliff and starts skiing down with Olive. Popeye eats his spinach and gives chase.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
